name: ShotMan
description:
Greedy Willie shots his way through an abandoned mine! Pick all the gold you can while you keep ghosts at bay with your shotgun. Make your own way blasting the walls if necessary..

If you blast the TNT and you catch a ghost with the blast it will be gone for good!

Controls: 

  • Arrows/WASD to move
  • SPACE to shoot

Music: Yokushun by Rolemusic is licensed under a Attribution 3.0 International License.
